text: Rudi Ceyssens (19 July 1962 - 20 December 2015) was a Belgian cyclist. He competed in three events at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Belgian male cyclists Category:Cyclists at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic cyclists of Belgium Category:People from Beringen, Belgium Category:Sportspeople from Limburg (Belgium)
title: Rudi Ceyssens
